attributes.action: Recognize the authority of the Duchy of Cornwall as a separate state within the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Cornwall's long status as a Duchy has been ignored.  We call on the government to restore the status of Cornwall and make use of the possibilities of setting up a special tax status area, which would have benefits for the whole of the UK.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Recognize the authority of the Duchy of Cornwall as a separate state within the UK."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number-10.gov.uk/output/Page11007.asp

Prime Minister's Office

Petition info: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/CornwallDuchy/
